item.description: We will be having a dinner party at Ristorante Molise in Wakefield with Fenway Frank and the Red Sox Natives . Cocktails will start at the bar at 6:15 pm and dinner at 7 pm. For 20 years Antonietta and Elisa have owned this restaurant and continued to serve authentic Italian cuisine. We will have a section just for us that can accommodate 30 people. Please RSVP if you plan to attend. You can review the menu and website at www.restaurantmolise.com

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner at Ristorante Molise
